title: Municipality of Kuzma
data: The Municipality of Kuzma (pronounced [ˈkuːzma]; Slovene: Občina Kuzma)[2] is a municipality in northeastern Slovenia. It gets its name from the largest settlement and administrative seat of the municipality, Kuzma.[2] The current mayor is Jožef Škalič. It borders Austria.
